tasks.task: Set up solar panels and related equipment for off-grid living.
subtasks: Install 18 solar panels, each rated at 550 watts.
Position the solar panels to capture optimal sunlight.
Connect the solar panels to the 7 kilowatt inverter.
Install two 10 kilowatt lithium battery systems.
Configure the battery systems to work with the solar setup.
Integrate Starlink internet service for off-grid connectivity.
Assess rainwater collection efficiency from the roof.
Ensure rainwater is directed into a suitable storage system.
Maintain a general setup of equipment for off-grid living.
